meta.description: Learn how Whisperly collects, uses, and protects your information.

title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Whisperly collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our translation API services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how Whisperly collects, uses, and protects your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including account information, API usage data, and translation content you submit through our services.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use collected data to provide and improve our translation services, process your requests, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share data with service providers who assist in operating our platform, or when required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@whisperly.io.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including account information and usage data.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: We use collected data to provide and improve our services, and to communicate with you.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information.
